import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { withTranslation } from "react-i18next" import { translationHelpers } from '../../../../helpers'; import { Table, Card, CardBody, Row, Col, Button, Label } from "reactstrap" import { AvForm, AvField, AvGroup } from "availity-reactstrap-validation" const FormFilter = (props) => { const [t, c] = translationHelpers('commercial_credit', 'common'); function handleSubmit() { } return (

{ c("Filters") }

 ); }; FormFilter.propTypes = { } export default (withTranslation(['commercial_credit'])(FormFilter));
